name: oooh banana
description:
WASD + IJKL to control banana body

this game was made during a jam for the exploration of gamefeel. we bought some bananas and spent some time squishing them, messing around with their feel, probably impossible to replicate with videogames. but we tried, and i think we made interesting and a somewhat more visceral type of gamefeel because of it. highly recommend the process. check out the other games!
